title: *Beautiful, Luxury 2-Bedroom Apt in Astoria* 31-19 4B
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building', '*Beautiful, Luxury 2-Bedroom Apt in Astoria*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*OCTOBER 1ST MOVE-IN*', '*The Apartment Features:*', '2 Queen-Size Bedrooms / Bathroom with a Deep Soaking Tub / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows /', 'The Living Space Can Accommodate a Sofa + TV Set-up & a small Dining Table / AC Unit in Each Room / Open Concept Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Built-in Microwave / High Ceilings / Modern Industrial Finishes / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom /', '*The Building Features:*', 'Gym / Lounge & Game Room / Roofdeck with Skyline Views / Laundry Room / Elevator /', 'A Step Away frpm the M & R Trains at Steinway St Station / A Short walk to the N & W Trains at Broadway Station /', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $144,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
